title: Digital_Seytan
author: Digital_Seytan
content: Radiator Fork of KlausT ccminer with Radiant and Novo support.List of known Radiant pools (RXD) Sha512256D PoW algorithmCompile: Radiant pools   : https://miningpoolstats.stream/radiantCode:./build.shMine Radiant:Code:./ccminer -a rad -o stratum+tcp://radpool.net:3052 -u ADDRESS.WORKER -p PASSWORDMine Novo:Code:./ccminer -a novo -o stratum+tcp://m.novopool.net:3333 -u ADDRESS.WORKER -p PASSWORDLicense: GPLv3. See LICENSE.txt for details.Download Radiator mining software Windows 64 no fee:https://github.com/xiaolin1579/radiatorDownload Radiator mining software Linux 64 no fee:https://github.com/radifier/radiator/releasesDownload Radiant miner software WildRig Multi much faster and 1% devfee:https://github.com/andru-kun/wildrig-multiDownload Radiant miner software Bzminer and 1% devfee:https://github.com/bzminer/bzminer
